meanings.definition: The quality or state of being daily.
meanings.sent1: The dailiness of the sunrise brings a sense of routine to each morning.
meanings.sent2: I appreciate the dailiness of my morning coffee; it's a comforting ritual.
meanings.sent3: The dailiness of brushing my teeth is a reminder to start the day fresh.
meanings.sent4: Her dailiness was like a steady heartbeat, constant and reassuring.
meanings.sent5: The dailiness of the changing seasons reminds us of the passage of time.

meanings.definition: The routine or regular occurrence of daily activities.
meanings.sent1: The dailiness of his exercise routine keeps him healthy and active.
meanings.sent2: In the dailiness of household chores, she finds a sense of accomplishment.
meanings.sent3: The dailiness of feeding the cat always puts a smile on my face.
meanings.sent4: The dailiness of her commute became a familiar part of her day.
meanings.sent5: The dailiness of practicing the piano slowly improved her skills over time.
